modName: Immersive Armors - Falkreath Armor with amidianBorn and protective female patch
summary: This not so simple mod gives the Falkreath Armor added by hothtrooper's Immersive Armors a mix of applied amidianborn textures (nord plate) and a patch for the tabard over them, also editing the shield and crown, made with the original banner of Falkreath so it fits better in the world.
descriptionHtml:
[b]REQUIRES [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]IMMERSIVE ARMORS[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]AMIDIANBORN BOOK OF SILENCE[/url] . OPTIONAL BUT HIGHLY RECOMMENDED: [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48160/?]PRACTICAL FEMALE ARMORS[/url][b] . IF YOU HAVE THIS, INSTALL THE SECOND FILE.[/b]

[b]Description:[/b]

This not so simple mod gives the Falkreath Armor added by hothtrooper's Immersive Armors a mix of applied amidianborn textures (nord plate) and a patch for the mantle over them, also editing the shield and crown, made with the original banner of Falkreath so it fits better in the world.

The textures of the nord plate have been lightened so it differs a bit from the original nord plate and a more "paladin" like armor, not too much, as well as the helmet; the mantle is now dark blue, it's put over the nord plate fur, and features the original knotted design of the deer from the falkreath hold. Falkreath Thanes rejoyce! Plus it's present in the shield, so now you have a full matching set. The original crown has been modified in nifskope so it uses the silver circlet textures, for a more coherent overall look.

[b]Installation:[/b]

Extract the files into your Skyrim/Data folder or use NMM/MO.

[b]ALL Credits and thanks to:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2000006/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Jzbai[/url] - for his Practical Female Armors.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3656551/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Hothtrooper44[/url] and authors from the compilation - for their amazing armors and mashups.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/571605/?tb=mods&pUp=1]CaBal 120 and the amidianBorn team[/url] - for their amazing texture replacers.
[/b]
author: hothtrooper plus CaBaL 120 and villacardo
